modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mini_scal: Create scale boxes easily using Immersive Portals functionality.
mini_scaled.press_shift: Press %1$s to Descend into the Scale Box
mini_scaled.invalid_box_size: The glass frame size %1$s is invalid. It should be either 4x4x4 or 8x8x8 or 16x16x16 or 32x32x32
mini_scaled.no_enough_space_to_place_sca: There isn't enough space to place the scale box of size %1$s.
mini_scaled.cannot_expand_direction: The scale box can only be expanded from the faces of inner up, south and east directions. Try the opposite direction.
mini_scaled.cannot_expand_mismatch: Cannot expand the scale box because the owner, scale and color don't match.
mini_scaled.cannot_expand_not_enough: Expanding the scale box requires %1$s entrance item(s) with the matching color, scale and owner.
mini_scaled.cannot_expand_size_limit: Cannot expand the scale box because the maximum inner length is 64
mini_scaled.cannot_shrink_direction: The scale box can only be shrunk the faces of inner up, south and east directions. Try the opposite direction.
mini_scaled.cannot_shrink_has_blocks: Cannot shrink the scale box because the shrunk region has blocks remaining.
mini_scaled.cannot_break_barrier: Cannot break the scale box barrier block. You can use commands to remove the block.
mini_scaled.return_to_spawn: You fell off the scale box. Teleporting to the spawnpoint.
mini_scaled.access_denied: Scale box access control disallows this operation.
mini_scaled.cannot_wrap_invalid_frame: Cannot Wrap. Glass Frame is incomplete.
mini_scaled.no_integer_scale: There is no possible integer scale for box size %d x %d x %d
mini_scaled.already_has_box: You already have scale box with color %s and scale %s. Try unwrapping that or try using another color.
mini_scaled.no_scale_box: You don't have any scale box yet
mini_scaled.acquire_entrance_cooldown: You can only get one entrance item every %s seconds.
mini_scaled.not_your_scale_box: This scale box is not yours.
mini_scaled.select_direction_for_unwrapp:
Select the direction for unwrapping.
Press %s to confirm.
mini_scaled.unwrapping_area_not_empty: The unwrapping area is not empty.
mini_scaled.count_limit: Each player can have at most %s scale boxes. Try unwrapping your existing scale boxes.
mini_scaled.non_wrappable_block: The area has a non-wrappable block at (%s, %s, %s).
mini_scaled.non_wrappable_entity: The area has a non-wrappable entity (%s).
mini_scaled.unwrapping_area_has_entity: Cannot unwrap because of the entity in region (%s).
mini_scaled.cannot_place_other_players_b: You cannot place other player's scale box.
mini_scaled.cannot_find_scale_box_for_it: Cannot find your scale box with the specified color and scale. Try using the manipulation wand to see what scale boxes you have.
mini_scaled.box_not_exist: The scale box corresponding to this item had been unwrapped.
mini_scaled.unwrapping_cancelled: Unwrapping cancelled because the main hand is not holding the manipulation wand.
mini_scaled.placed_other_players_box_wit: You placed other players' scale box using the permission.
mini_scaled.manipulate_other_players_box: You manipulated other players' scale box using the permission.
mini_scaled.access_control: You cannot access this box due to access control.
